title: Grateful Dead Live at Red Rocks Amphitheatre on 1987-08-11
source: DTS-Audio-CD 5.1 Mix; SBD (shnid = 92056) Recording Info:SBD -> PCM -> Sonic Solutions -> CD; Transfer Info:CD -> Samplitude Professional v10.02 -> FLAC Original Transfer and Mastering by David Gans; Additional Transfer and Mastering By Charlie Miller + AUD (shnid = 138303) FOB Schoeps CMC32s, mics spaced 8' -> Apogee mod Sony PCMF1 -> Sony Betamax; Taper unknown; Dougal Donaldson Transfer from his PCM clone of the master; Sony Beta SL-HF360 > Sony PCM501 > analog outputs > MAudio soundcard > Soundforge > CD Architect > CD @44.1 kHz; Subsequent transfer from CD > SFDIF > MAudio > Soundforge, WAV file converted to FLAC; Joe Noel: Label, Patch, Pack, re-Track in Audacity; Checksum & tags created in xACT - dts mixing by Kevin Tobin
